#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>

#define limit 20001

using namespace std;
int dp[limit][505];
int main()
{
    char s[limit+1];

    int q;
    cin>>s;
    int len =strlen(s);
    cin>>q;
    for(int i =0;i<q;i++)
    {
        int m,l;
        cin>>m>>l;
        for(int k =0;k<len+1;k++)
        {
            for(int j =0;j<m;j++)
                dp[k][j]=0;
        }
        int ans =0;
        for(int v =1;v<len+1;v++)
        {
            dp[v-1][0]+=1;
            for(int j =0;j<m;j++)
            {
                if(dp[v-1][j])
                    dp[v][(j*10+s[v-1]-'0')%m] +=dp[v-1][j];
            }
            ans = ans +dp[v][l];
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
